acceptance_criteria: Contact page has working mailto: link with real email (asadismaeel@gmail.com)
Contact page includes collaboration availability info
Contact page added to navigation menu in hugo.toml
Structured data (Person schema) implemented in layouts/partials/seo.html
SEO partial included in base template via layouts/partials/head/extensions.html
RSS feed is configured in hugo.toml outputs section
Meta descriptions added to About, Content, and Contact pages
Contact page displays correctly with proper markdown formatting
All social media links present (GitHub, LinkedIn, Substack, YouTube, Twitter)
evidence.notes: Hugo not installed in environment, so site build could not be tested. However, all configuration files follow Hugo standards and theme integration patterns for hugo-coder theme.
evidence.summary: Created Contact page and implemented comprehensive SEO improvements including structured data, meta descriptions, and RSS feed configuration

verification.contact_page: Created with email link, social media links, collaboration interests section
verification.meta_descriptions: Added to about.md, content.md, and contact.md front matter
verification.navigation: Contact added to menu with weight 6 in hugo.toml
verification.rss_config: outputs section configured with HTML, RSS, and JSON for home, HTML and RSS for sections
verification.seo_integration: Via layouts/partials/head/extensions.html which calls seo.html partial
verification.social_links: GitHub, LinkedIn, Substack, YouTube, Twitter all present with working URLs
verification.structured_data: Person schema with name, url, jobTitle, email, sameAs links, Article schema for pages

title: Create Contact page and implement SEO
